channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report E-2023110226
item.description:
Report E-2023110226

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-29T18:13:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG WEST, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The KAG West, LLC driver was delivering Xylenes solution into the customer's storage tank. It appears there was a faulty pressure relief valve on the storage tank that cause the tank to over-pressurize. This caused approximately 100 gallons of Xylenes solution to be released. The customer dispatched an environmental contractor to handle the remediation.

item.title: Report E-2023110135
item.description:
Report E-2023110135

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-29T00:33:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-07
  • City: FAIRVIEW
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: MARATHON PETROLEUM COMPANY LP
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During unloading, the camlock had loosened due to absence of safety strap and leaked about 10 gallons of oil onto the ground.
